vlive.korean: 치아까지 우리 같이 닮아볼까요? Should we make our teeth similar, too? 듣기 View video HA SUNG WOON : 구르미의 TMI
vlive.english: Should we make our teeth similar, too?

vlive.korean: 제가 '너랑 나'에서 했던 모습과 되게 닮아있지 않나요? Wasn't I similar to myself on "YOU&I?" 듣기 View video IU : [Replay] [IU] Comeback VLIVE
vlive.english: Wasn't I similar to myself on "YOU&I?"

vlive.korean: [의미 발굴단 대장 이대휘] 또 AB6IX는 가족이다 보니까 닮아있구나? [Dae Hwi is best at changing the meaning] Since AB6IX is a family, we look the same! 듣기 View video AB6IX : [예삐소드] AB6IX (에이비식스) 2019 AWARDS BEHIND #1
vlive.english: [Dae Hwi is best at changing the meaning] Since AB6IX is a family, we look the same!

vlive.korean: 크면서 저를 닮아가더라고요 - 안 돼! - 뭐라고요? But now he looks like me. - No! - Sorry? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 13🦊(feat.🐻)
vlive.english: But now he looks like me. - No! - Sorry?

vlive.korean: [태진아를 닮아 태 회장님이라 불리는 조명감독님] 노래! [Lighting director who looks like singer Tae Jinah] Let's sing! 듣기 View video Park Hae Jin : [Park Hae Jin] 데뷔 13주년 축하현장을 공개합니다!
vlive.english: [Lighting director who looks like singer Tae Jinah] Let's sing!

examples.korean: She closely resembled her mother at the same age. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그 나이 때의 어머니를 아주 많이 닮아 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She closely resembled her mother at the same age. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He looked uncannily like someone I knew. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 묘하게 내가 아는 누군가와 닮아 보였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He looked uncannily like someone I knew. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The style of painting in the Renaissance was much like the style in Greece and Rome. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 르네상스 시대의 화풍은 그리스와 로마 시대의 그것과 매우 닮아 있었다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: The style of painting in the Renaissance was much like the style in Greece and Rome. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The quilt designs looked like people's homelands. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 퀼트의 도안은 사람들의 (그들이 떠나온) 고국과 닮아 있었다. Neungyule
examples.english: The quilt designs looked like people's homelands. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Looks like I'm taking after you. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 너를 닮아가는 것 같군. Neungyule
